text: @senatemajldr There's absolutely no reason to believe what you say. Look at how great America is under @realDonaldTrump, you & #Barr.  Over 153,000+ are dead from #COVID19; our economy will take years to recover & your LAW & ORDER decree was a huge fail against the demand for equal rights.
